Established in 1984, IET Lucknow has been, the centre of learning and all-round evolvement of students.The Institute is committed to nurturing talent in all forms and so it provides the students an opportunity to showcase their brilliance in the form of a statewide platform that stands for Endeavour, Nous, Creativity, Opera, Rollick and Enthusiasm, and is aptly called as ENCORE.

ENCORE brings with it, a plethora of events, comprising of all major dancing, singing, fine arts, dramatics and informal events; where the youth of the state get together, interact, and indulge in a fair game. ENCORE witnesses participation of students from over 20 top colleges across UP. Over 2000 footfalls per day are witnessed during the festival.

With the exciting theme of"Rewind-Reload-Relive the 90's" ENCORE 2017 is all set to take you on a ride down the memory lane to a place filled with nostalgic memories of your childhood. To the times of "Jay, Veeru, Basanti" and "Mogambo Khush Hua". From Md. Kaif to VVS Laxman to Saurav Ganguly. Those monochrome screens in our Nokia 1200 mobile phones. We the 90's kids have seen the century change. So let us look back this day, let us rewind and reload and relieve the 90's.

An Autonomous Constituent Institute of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, U.P., Lucknow 

Institute of Engineering And Technology, Lucknow (better known as the "Engineering College" in Lucknow), is the oldest engineering college of Lucknow. It was inaugurated on November 1984 with the objective of producing quality engineers in every discipline.

The institute is situated on the outskirts of Aliganj or on the entrance of Lucknow from Sitapur road. It is well reputed all throughout the state of Uttar Pradesh and has been spreading its fame throughout the country through its professionals. The institute had started with a mere strength of around 200 students. Now the strength has reached up to 1500 students. The institute is run by the government with a highly qualified faculty in every discipline. The institute has been accredited by AICTE.
